mdRecord.dcterms:title: Singing School of Topeco Church of the Brethren
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Singing School of Topeco Church of the Brethren (circa 1918 - 1920) Mr. Garland Shirley of Dayton, Virginia held two ten-day singing school sesions when he came to the Topeco community. Jacob Alderman was the song leader for Topeco and conducted many singing schools throughout the area.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia--Dayton
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
